name: Wind
description:
Weapon has the wind element, Mt -2, Hit +10, and Crit +5. After combat that this unit initiated, for each hit, choose a mode:
  * Move Target Foe one space.
  * Move this unit one space.

Disabled on non-Reason weapons and weapons with #{attribute}{Ice}, #{attribute}{Fire}, and #{attribute}{Lightning}
comment: Items in modifers should be integers
